item.description:
Hi, Everybody:

Starting at noon, let's enjoy our monthly Italian lunch today    Just click on Anjon's above, which will lead you to the link to their website and their delicious and very reasonably priced luncheon menu!  We always have an enjoyable time here!  Super food in a great setting near the Marsh - and they have other great entrees besides Italian as well!

Any questions, let me know.  Hope to see you there!

Randy

 

Restaurant Meetup Policy
Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend to allow us to make reservations. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 2 "no shows" to restaurant meetups, you will no longer be allowed to attend restaurant meetups.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be inside waiting until noon; after that ask for Randy's Meetup Group.
item.name: Italian at Anjons!
